metadata.description: Collaborative Intelligence Extensions - Cognitive extensions that enhance human capability, not replace it.

plugins.name: arch-guild
plugins.description: Architectural reasoning with The Guild. 13 specialized agents with orthogonal perspectives for multi-viewpoint architecture review.

plugins.name: build-evals
plugins.description: Eval methodology for AI systems. Use when: writing evals for agents, skills, MCP servers, prompts, or measuring AI behavior.

plugins.name: collab-scaffolds
plugins.description: Research-grounded scaffolds for effective human-AI collaboration. Use when: making decisions, verifying claims, calibrating trust, metacognitive reflection, building with transparency and control.

plugins.name: data-store
plugins.description: Data storage and retrieval patterns. Use when: choosing databases, implementing search, designing hybrid retrieval, selecting embedding models, building RAG systems.

plugins.name: extension-dev
plugins.description: Build extensions that enable effective human-AI collaboration. Use when: creating skills, agents, hooks, commands, MCPs, or tools/APIs. Patterns for transparency, control, observability, diversity.

plugins.name: openclaw-srt
plugins.description: Set up OpenClaw with SRT sandbox for secure AI assistant operation. Use when: installing OpenClaw, configuring SRT sandboxing, securing personal AI assistants.

plugins.name: prompt-craft
plugins.description: Prompt engineering for reasoning models, deep research, paper synthesis, and style imitation. Evidence-backed techniques for different model architectures.

plugins.name: craft-explanations
plugins.description: Explanation craft through simultaneous encoding. Use when: writing docs, explaining concepts, teaching in conversation, creating tutorials, curating documentation collections, making diagrams for explanation.
